about_the_game:
Exotic Cars VI

With Exotic Cars VI, Lany Games attempts to recreate the real world, the open world is huge, realistic, interactive and detailed. Combining action, narrative and gameplay in new ways, there is a vast world to explore set in Miami, New York and Los Angeles. You can choose to play as Oliver or Nora with different decisions and consequences, the world is alive and responsive to the player. The world has a wide variety of Cars, Planes, Weapons, Clothes, Restaurants, Luxury Stores, all with real brands that are organically integrated. Everything you do will contribute to your progress in the world by accessing new missions, cars, heists and rewards.

Exotic Cars VI Online:

Discover an ever-evolving world by playing and acquiring cars, weapons, luxury clothing, houses, apartments, penthouses and completing missions with friends in a massive and detailed world based in Miami, New York and Los Angeles where you can level up and build an empire and achieve massive success.

Brands:

In the open world there are real brands that are organically integrated. There are over 700 cars, detailed, interactive and each with unique characteristics. The world features restaurants such as Burger King, McDonald's, clothing, stores, food and beverages with which the player can interact.

Cars:

The game contains over 700 vehicles, all incredibly detailed and each with unique interiors, engines and features. The brands included are: Abarth, Acura, Alfa Romeo, Alpine, Alumi Craft, AMC, AMG, Ariel, Ascari, Aston Martin, Audi, Austin-Healey, Auto Union, Autos Sierra, BAC, Bentley, BMW, Bowler, Bugatti, Buick, Cadillac, Caterham, Chevrolet, Datsun, Deberti, Dodge, Eagle, Exomotive, Ferrari, Fiat, Ford, GMC, HDT, Hennessey, Holden, HSV, Hummer, Hyundai, Infiniti, Jaguar, Jeep, KIA, KMT, Koenigsegg, Lamborghini, Lancia, Land Rover, Lexus, Local Motors, Lotus, Maserati, Mazda, McLaren, Mercedes-AMG, Mercedes-Benz, Mercury, MG, Mini, Mitsubishi, Morgan, Morris, Mosler, Nissan, Opel, Pagani. Penhall, Peugeot, Plymouth, Polaris, Pontiac, Porsche, Radical, Raesr, RAM, Reliant, Renault, Rimac, Saleen, Shelby, Spania GTA, Subaru, Sunbeam, Tamo, Tesla, Toyota, Triumph, TVR, Vauxhall, Volkswagen, Volvo, Vuhl, W Motors, Willys, Zenvo.

PC:

Exotic Cars VI is built for PC. Our studio focused on giving the best experience, from 60 frames at 4K with RayTracing or 30 frames at 8K with RayTracing.

content_descriptors.notes: Nuestro juego tiene Blood, Drug Reference, Intense Violence, Partial Nudity, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco

detailed_description:
STORY

EXOTIC CARS VI STORY:

The protagonist of Exotic Cars VI, has in the game what is called the hero’s journey, it is a path of revenge and redemption. The protagonist has a mentor to help him, along his journey he has to lose everything he has and all his loved ones in order to complete his journey and rise again.


EDITIONS

EXOTIC CARS VI STANDARD EDITION:

  • EXOTIC CARS VI GAME BASE
  • 1,000,000 EC DOLLARS ONLINE
  • 1,000,000 EC DOLLARS STORY
  • EXCLUSIVE APARTMENT
  • "DON'T BE AFRAID"
    PLAYER CARD BACKGROUND
  • "I'M WITH YOU" TAG

EXOTIC CARS VI GOLD EDITION:

  • EXOTIC CARS VI GAME BASE
  • 5,000,000 EC DOLLARS ONLINE
  • 5,000,000 EC DOLLARS STORY
  • EXCLUSIVE EPIC APARTMENT
  • "DON'T BE AFRAID"
    PLAYER CARD BACKGROUND
  • "I'M WITH YOU" TAG
  • EXCLUSIVE LUXURY AIRPLANE
  • EXCLUSIVE CONCEPT ART
  • EXCLUSIVE CLOTHING

EXOTIC CARS VI ULTIMATE EDITION:

  • EXOTIC CARS VI GAME BASE
  • 7,000,000 EC DOLLARS ONLINE
  • 7,000,000 EC DOLLARS STORY
  • EXCLUSIVE APARTMENT "7,000,000"
  • "DON'T BE AFRAID"
    PLAYER CARD BACKGROUND
  • "I'M WITH YOU" TAG
  • EXCLUSIVE LUXURY AIRPLANE
  • EXCLUSIVE CONCEPT ART
  • EXCLUSIVE CLOTHING
  • EXCLUSIVE WEAPONS
  • EXCLUSIVE MISSIONS
  • EXCLUSIVE CARS
  • YEAR 1 PASS

name: Exotic Cars VI Standard Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) / Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 3.0 GHz Or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) / Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-13900K 3.6 GHz Or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: M.2 recommended
